item.title: 1 Minds on the Masters: Dr. Closuit
item.description: Hey man, I'm Jeff Minds. On my show, I talk to some of the best out there in art, science, and living authentically; as long as they respond to my emails. This week, I interview Dr Closuit: hetrodox physicist. It's a headtrip. Broadcasted: Sat, September 30th, 2023, 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WLPN-LP 105.5 FM Lumpen Radio, Chicago IL twitch.tv/awcyfm

item.title: 72 EurekaCast NOW! Brian Urlacher: What Happened to Sacking the Vote?
item.description:
The LATEST news in Science, and also Technology. The 2023 Mayoral runoff in Chicago may be over, but questions remain. BRIAN URLACHER was slated to SACK THE WARDS, yet not a single election map shows him even listed. Evidence of a conspiracy? Or is it THE GREAT FEINT of a master political tactician? CYGNE WINDMILL, scholar of the occult and local politics wonk, joins us in the studio to lend an expert opinion. Broadcasted: Sat, April 8th, 2023, 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WLPN-LP 105.5 FM Lumpen Radio, Chicago IL and twitch.tv/awcyfm
EurekaCast NOW! awcyfm.com/eurekacast

item.itunes:author: Kai Hubris, Rowan Meadowlark, AWCY?-FM
item.title: The Scouring of Santa Claus, Indiana
item.description:
The LATEST news in Science, and also Technology. Underneath the rollin' waves of the Holiday World Surfin' Safari theme park in the small town of Santa Claus, Indiana lies the compacted wreckage of one of the deadliest and most horrific industrial disasters in United States history. On that holy night, Christmas Eve, 1932, over 200 men, women, children, and innocent tourists met their grisly demise in a candy inferno that laid ruin to the nearly 4,000 acre manufacturing township. Thanks to state-of-the-art technological developments in ground penetrating radar, magnetic core analysis, and cutting-edge simulations provided by Tech Brothers DisasLabs, for the first time ever, you will hear the true story of that fateful night. In this program, we will recount every mistake, every blunder, and every devastating event. Paired with never before heard first-hand accounts read by voice actors, and an exclusive interview with a survivor of the tragedy in an AWCY FM special holiday documentary event: THE SCOURING OF SANTA CLAUS. Broadcasted: Sat, January 1st and 8th, 2022, 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WLPN-LP 105.5 FM Lumpen Radio, Chicago IL
EurekaCast NOW! awcyfm.com/eurekacast
Special thanks to: https://rodydavis.github.io/creative_engineering
